verses.verse: <S%G5124>This<s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> time I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you. In the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> shall <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> be <S%G2476>established.<s%>

I <S%G4280>told<s%> you <S%G4280>before,<s%> and <S%G4302>foretell<s%> you, as <S%G1437>if<s%> I were <S%G3918>present,<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> time; and being <S%G548>absent<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to them which <S%G4258>heretofore<s%> have <S%G4258>sinned,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3062>other,<s%> that, if I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>again,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3825><s%> I will not <S%G5339>spare:<s%>

<S%G1893>Since<s%> you <S%G2212>seek<s%> a <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> in me, <S%G3739>which<s%> to <S%G1519>you-ward<s%> <S%G5209><s%> is not <S%G770>weak,<s%> but is <S%G1414>mighty<s%> in you.

For <S%G1487>though<s%> he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G769>weakness,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> he <S%G2198>lives<s%> by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> For we <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> in him, but we shall <S%G2198>live<s%> with him by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you.

<S%G3985>Examine<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you be in the <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G1381>prove<s%> <S%G1438>your<s%> own <S%G1438>selves.<s%> <S%G1921>Know<s%> you not <S%G1438>your<s%> own <S%G1438>selves,<s%> how that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is in you, <S%G1509>except<s%> you be <S%G96>reprobates?<s%>
But I <S%G1679>trust<s%> that you shall <S%G1097>know<s%> that we are not <S%G96>reprobates.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G2172>pray<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> that you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3367><s%> <S%G2556>evil;<s%> not that we should <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1384>approved,<s%> but that you should <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2570>honest,<s%> though we be as <S%G96>reprobates.<s%>
For we <S%G1410>can<s%> do <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> but for the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

For we are <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> we are <S%G770>weak,<s%> and you are <S%G1415>strong:<s%> and <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2172>wish,<s%> even <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2676>perfection.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things being <S%G548>absent,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> being <S%G3918>present<s%> I should <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G664>sharpness,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> me to <S%G3619>edification,<s%> and not to <S%G2506>destruction.<s%>

<S%G3063>Finally,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5463>farewell.<s%> Be <S%G2675>perfect,<s%> be of good <S%G3870>comfort,<s%> be of <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G5426>mind,<s%> <S%G1514>live<s%> in <S%G1518>peace;<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall be with you.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2842>communion<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> The second epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
